intro.sub: Focused on Back-end and based in the Philippines

experience.title: Dec 2023 - Present
experience.cardDetailedText:
-Collaborating on system design and architecture, ensuring alignment with business objectives.
-Leading full-stack development, designing responsive front-end interfaces and implementing efficient back-end system
-Managing database design and optimization, ensuring data integrity and security.
-Developing and maintaining RESTful APIs for seamless communication between front-end and back-end components.
-Implementing comprehensive testing strategies to ensure application reliability, performance, and security.
-Identifying and addressing performance bottlenecks, optimizing code, and enhancing application scalability.
-Providing technical leadership and mentorship to junior developers, promoting best practices and coding standards.
-Collaborating with cross-functional teams to translate requirements into technical solutions
-Proactively identifying opportunities for process improvement and automation.
-Creating and maintaining technical documentation to facilitate ongoing support and maintenance.

- Identify existing CRM customization bottlenecks and provide solutions or optimizations

- Configures Zoho CRM base on client requirements using admin settings
- Attend to daily scrums with client to discuss progress updates
